column5: I've been out the last few days and we never smashed them like some people have out there.  Such a game of timing and wanted to stay away from the crowds out there.  Fishing has been getting better and better since the beginning of the season though and we're all getting fish now.  Got a few fish on video this week, figured I'd share it with you guys. Havent really had a hot bait out there, caught them on jigging raps, bad boys, spoons, tubes and laker takers. Enjoy!  Beware of possible foul language, I cant control em all haha  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gi6tovlYdlA
Nice going Steve.   Good to see you on them. Be safe out there!
cool vid man I enjoyed watching...  beautiful whitie and lakers.. nicely done..
Really great video, some nice lakers and whities there
thanks. I'm hoping to get more video this season, especially bass and pike fishing
